Articles.Content:
I\'ve read on several places that parts have a minimal size limit in Unity. Can somebody explain that please?

What are the minimal sizes (x,y,z) of parts and are there maximumsizes?

Cheers,

The Xardinal

I think HarvesteR mentioned that any part smaller than 1 unit gave the team trouble, and some parts like the propane thrusters on Tosh\'s cart cannot be made to not explode because the mesh is so small, but I don\'t think it\'s documented anywhere.
If it\'s not documented, i\'ll just have to try and see what happens. Thank you, Sal-vager.
